amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide $100 million for use of constructing a border fence along the southern international border.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for use of constructing a border fence along the southern international border.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. King (IA).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
